(ROOT
  (S
    (SBAR (IN If)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VBP are)
          (VP (VBG hankering)
            (PP (IN for))))))
    (NP (DT some))
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (VP (VBP shiok)
      (S
        (NP (NNS dishes))
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB make)
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (VB eat)
                (NP (JJR more) (NN rice))))))))
    (, ,)))


mark(hankering-4, If-1)
nsubj(hankering-4, you-2)
aux(hankering-4, are-3)
advcl(shiok-8, hankering-4)
prep(hankering-4, for-5)
nsubj(shiok-8, some-6)
advmod(shiok-8, really-7)
root(ROOT-0, shiok-8)
nsubj(make-11, dishes-9)
aux(make-11, to-10)
xcomp(shiok-8, make-11)
nsubj(eat-13, you-12)
ccomp(make-11, eat-13)
amod(rice-15, more-14)
dobj(eat-13, rice-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB then))
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB try)
        (S
          (VP (VBG heading)
            (ADVP (RB down)
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP Smith) (NNP Street) (NNP Food) (NNP Centre))))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB check)
                  (PRT (RP out))
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT this) (JJ little) (NN Mom))
                    (CC and)
                    (NP
                      (NP (NNP Pop) (NNP Cze) (NNP Char))
                      (SBAR
                        (WHNP (WP who))
                        (S
                          (VP (VBZ specializes)
                            (PP (IN in)
                              (NP (NNP Cantonese) (NN style) (NN cuisine)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(try-4, then-1)
nsubj(try-4, you-2)
aux(try-4, can-3)
root(ROOT-0, try-4)
xcomp(try-4, heading-5)
advmod(heading-5, down-6)
prep(down-6, to-7)
det(Centre-12, the-8)
nn(Centre-12, Smith-9)
nn(Centre-12, Street-10)
nn(Centre-12, Food-11)
pobj(to-7, Centre-12)
aux(check-14, to-13)
xcomp(heading-5, check-14)
prt(check-14, out-15)
det(Mom-18, this-16)
amod(Mom-18, little-17)
dobj(check-14, Mom-18)
cc(Mom-18, and-19)
nn(Char-22, Pop-20)
nn(Char-22, Cze-21)
conj(Mom-18, Char-22)
nsubj(specializes-24, who-23)
rcmod(Char-22, specializes-24)
prep(specializes-24, in-25)
nn(cuisine-28, Cantonese-26)
nn(cuisine-28, style-27)
pobj(in-25, cuisine-28)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (ADVP (RB Actually))
      (NP (DT this) (NN stall))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADJP (RB quite) (JJ famous)
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (PRP$ its) (NNP Beef) (NNP Hor) (NNP Fun))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBG wanting)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB check)
                  (NP (PRP them))
                  (PRT (RP out))
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP (DT the) (JJS longest) (NN time))))))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(famous-6, Actually-1)
det(stall-3, this-2)
nsubj(famous-6, stall-3)
cop(famous-6, is-4)
advmod(famous-6, quite-5)
root(ROOT-0, famous-6)
prep(famous-6, for-7)
poss(Fun-11, its-8)
nn(Fun-11, Beef-9)
nn(Fun-11, Hor-10)
pobj(for-7, Fun-11)
cc(famous-6, and-12)
nsubj(wanting-16, I-13)
aux(wanting-16, have-14)
aux(wanting-16, been-15)
conj(famous-6, wanting-16)
aux(check-18, to-17)
xcomp(wanting-16, check-18)
dobj(check-18, them-19)
prt(check-18, out-20)
prep(check-18, for-21)
det(time-24, the-22)
amod(time-24, longest-23)
pobj(for-21, time-24)


(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (ADVP (WRB when))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB eventually))
    (VP (VBD got)
      (ADVP (RB there)))
    (, ,)))


cc(got-5, But-1)
advmod(got-5, when-2)
nsubj(got-5, I-3)
advmod(got-5, eventually-4)
root(ROOT-0, got-5)
advmod(got-5, there-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP they))
    (VP (VBD ran)
      (PRT (RP out))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (NNP Hor) (NNP Fun))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(ran-2, they-1)
root(ROOT-0, ran-2)
prt(ran-2, out-3)
prep(ran-2, of-4)
nn(Fun-6, Hor-5)
pobj(of-4, Fun-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Sigh))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Sigh-1)


(ROOT
  (S (IN So)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD had)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB settle)
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NNP Cze) (NNP Char) (NNS dishes))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WDT which))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBD turned)
                      (PRT (RP out))
                      (S
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB be)
                            (NP (PDT quite) (DT a) (NN treat))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


dep(had-3, So-1)
nsubj(had-3, I-2)
root(ROOT-0, had-3)
aux(settle-5, to-4)
xcomp(had-3, settle-5)
prep(settle-5, for-6)
det(dishes-10, the-7)
nn(dishes-10, Cze-8)
nn(dishes-10, Char-9)
pobj(for-6, dishes-10)
nsubj(turned-12, which-11)
rcmod(dishes-10, turned-12)
prt(turned-12, out-13)
aux(treat-18, to-14)
cop(treat-18, be-15)
predet(treat-18, quite-16)
det(treat-18, a-17)
xcomp(turned-12, treat-18)
